mapper.select: SELECT sp.id AS id, sp.product_id AS productId, sp.seckill_price AS seckillPrice, sp.intergral AS integral, sp.stock_count AS stockCount, sp.start_date AS startDate, sp.time AS time, p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_title AS productTitle, p.product_img AS productImg, p.product_detail AS productDetail, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM seckill_product sp LEFT JOIN product p ON sp.product_id = p.id where start_date = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and time = #{time};

SELECT sp.id AS id, sp.product_id AS productId, sp.seckill_price AS seckillPrice, sp.limit_buy AS limitBuy, sp.stock_count AS stockCount, sp.start_date AS startDate, sp.time AS time, p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_title AS productTitle, p.product_img AS productImg, p.product_detail AS productDetail, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM seckill_product sp LEFT JOIN product p ON sp.product_id = p.id where sp.id = #{seckillId}
